Alliance Landfill
hours: Monday: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Tuesday: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Wednesday: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Thursday: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Friday: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Saturday: 8:00 AM - 3:30 PM
materials: Broken Asphalt/Aggregate; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Christmas Trees; Concrete (Set); Construction Materials; Large Household Appliances; Wood Pallets; Tree Trimmings; Used Motor Oil; Used Tires
notes:
Assistance in proper disposal of these items will be provided by staff at the landfill. Other items like concrete and sod can be disposed of in the facility, however the established per ton disposal fee will apply to these items. Therefore, facility users can save money by placing these items at the separate locations on the landfill property. 

If you intend to haul these banned items to the facility for disposal, please be prepared to unload them in the proper area. If you are hauling large quantities of this type of banned waste, please haul it in separate loads for easy disposal.
